user.title: Pair with HomeKit Accessory
user.description: Select the device you want to pair with

pair.title: Pair with HomeKit Accessory
pair.description: Enter your HomeKit pairing code (in the format XXX-XX-XXX) to use this accessory

error.unable_to_pair: Unable to pair, please try again.
error.unknown_error: Device reported an unknown error. Pairing failed.
error.authentication_error: Incorrect HomeKit code. Please check it and try again.
error.max_peers_error: Device refused to add pairing as it has no free pairing storage.
error.busy_error: Device refused to add pairing as it is already pairing with another controller.
error.max_tries_error: Device refused to add pairing as it has received more than 100 unsuccessful authentication attempts.
error.pairing_failed: An unhandled error occurred while attempting to pair with this device. This may be a temporary failure or your device may not be supported currently.

abort.no_devices: No unpaired devices could be found
abort.already_paired: This accessory is already paired to another device. Please reset the accessory and try again.
abort.ignored_model: HomeKit support for this model is blocked as a more feature complete native integration is available.
abort.already_configured: Accessory is already configured with this controller.
abort.invalid_config_entry: This device is showing as ready to pair but there is already a conflicting configuration entry for it in Home Assistant that must first be removed.
abort.accessory_not_found_error: Cannot add pairing as device can no longer be found.
abort.already_in_progress: Config flow for device is already in progress.
